errors.location_denied: Location access denied. Please enable location services in your browser settings.
errors.location_failed: Failed to retrieve location. Please check your browser settings.
errors.location_unsupported: Geolocation is not supported by this browser. Please use a modern browser that supports the Geolocation API.
errors.location_insecure: Geolocation requires a secure connection (HTTPS). Please access the site via HTTPS.
errors.location_unavailable: Location is unavailable. Please ensure location services are enabled on your device.
errors.location_timeout: Location request timed out. Please try again.

messages.no_city_added: No city added yet. Please add a city.
